author: Jayden
text: order got cancelled after 3 weeks without communication. very disappointed as this was my first purchase with stockx
title: order got cancelled after 3 weeks…

author: Stephen
text: They say that they will check and verify the items you bought through their's website but they don't do it. Very dispointing!
title: Not to be trusted

author: Kendra
text: I think the prices are a bit high and the shipping process takes a while. I understand the process, but it'll take a bit of getting used to. My son loves his shoes though!
title: A bit high and…

author: Andrea
text: I received shoes  that were not knew. I was under the impression that this site sales Only brand new shoe. For the amount I paid, I am very disappointed. We purchasing the show I was not informed that this pair was used.
title: I received shoes  that were not knew

author: Alice Smith
text: I am very disappointed that I payed a lot of money for an item, not to mention ‘it got lost in the post’ the first time round and then they refused to give me back the money. They sent another one out that didn’t come for weeks. When the the item came and I received it, I realised it was FAKE. Now that is utterly ridiculous that you pay so much money for a ‘designer item’ and then it comes and it’s fake what a joke!!! WILL NEVER BE ORDERING FROM YOUS AGAIN AND WILL MAKE SURE THAT I LET OTHERS KNOW THAT TO! Also was a birthday present for someone and could clearly tell it was fake, so how embarrassing giving someone something they will know is fake.
title: FAKE!!

author: Lanaki
text: I ordered from stock x and my order has been delayed twice and the fees are ridiculous. I still haven’t received any confirmation that I will actually receive what I ordered. I’m probably not going to use stock x again.
title: I ordered from stock x and my order has…

author: Stephen
text: Great product,  poor customer service and slow seller.  Took over a week to send to StockX for verification.
title: Great product

author: Jenson
text: They sent the wrong size and you won’t make them send me the right size and I let you know before it got to stock x for authenticfication
title: They sent the wrong size and you won’t…

author: Shavon
text: I ordered this telfar bag as a gift. It’s delayed, and I have not even received an estimate arrival date! Just awful. I would give 0 stars if I could
title: Late gift

author: Mate Antal
text: I ordered a pair of Nike Dunk Fossil Rose and it is scratched. What is more, inside the shoe, I suppose because of a production error, there is big bulge what hurts my feet a lot, so unfortunately I can't wear the sneaker. I noticed the problems after removing the StockX tag, so I suppose that there is nothing I could do.
title: bulge in my shoe

author: Rachel
text: Looked forever for this purse, y'all took my money and keep delaying shipments of my merchandise
title: Looked forever for this purse

author: Mandez
text: Shoes took forever and longer than initially told… poor communication not clear overview

author: Ahmed
text: All are good except one thing, you are i real need to put a restrictions on the buyers in regards of shipping their goods to StockX for authentication process. As it take too long only when it comes to the buyer to ship the item to StockX. Once it is there everything in more than perfect
title: All are good except one thing

author: anna
text: Ordered weeks ago then notified that the first seller didn’t work. They confirmed I would get set up with another seller - that also failed and then got refunded close to 3 weeks after ordering.
title: Ordered weeks ago then notified that…

author: Jordan
text: Never received my order🙃
title: Never received my order🙃

author: Jacob
text:
Worst customer service. 
FedEx lost my shoes and Stockx give me the runaround to refund my payment. FedEx has case number and investigated that my shoes were lost but Stockx won’t refund me unless I submit a form which I cannot because I have no printer nor can download the form to fill it out. I requested to mail the form to me but you guys won’t.

Update:
I was able to download the PDF form but I have to Snip/screenshot it to send it back to you guys. So far, haven’t heard from the customer support. 

Why a $250 shoes is shipped without signature?
title: WHERE IS MY REFUND???

author: Sheshe
text: Wish I was contacted sooner than later that my  order couldn’t be fulfilled and I was being refunded. I had an event to were those shoes to.
title: Wish I was contacted sooner than later…
